display_long_description:
Welcome to Scribbled VR!
At B.R.I.D.G.E.S, your task is to explore and research the "Backrooms of Reality," where people have been ending up for years. Our goal here is to eradicate the threat of this realm from humanity. You have been assigned to the exploration branch. You will join team Trailblazer to explore and discover new "levels" and areas previously unknown to us at B.R.I.D.G.E.S so we can remove all threats. You will start your expedition soon. We have high expectations. Good luck.


This game is a Gorilla Tag style locomotion game with a deep and thrilling story! In the game, you can look around the shop and customize your character, play the game modes with your friends, and explore the main horror/story mode. The game has a cartoony paper style that really pops out, and an original story and set of characters. Overall, Scribbled VR is a unique twist on backrooms VR with lots of fun waiting within it. We hope you have a great experience! Bye now!
